EmailTemplate.subject: Texas EMS - Hospitality Suite Invitation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Texas EMS - Hospitality Suite Monday, November 21 l Hilton Austin
Harris County Emergency Corps and TriTech Software Systems cordially invite you to the TriTech Hospitality Suite. Enjoy hosted beverages, hors d'ouevres and door prizes. For details and to pick up your exclusive invitation, visit Harris County Emergency Corps Booth I-1 or contact Brenda or Larry.
Date: Monday, November 21
Time: 6:00 p.m. to 8:00 p.m.
Location: Hilton Austin (adjacent to Austin Convention Center)
LOOKING FORWARD TO A GREAT CONFERENCE:
Brenda Taylor brenda.taylor@tritech.com C: 563.379.3262
Larry Burns larry.burns@tritech.com C: (858) 229-9584
Share this message with colleagues or visit us at www.tritech.com
This email was sent by TriTech Software Systems
9860 Mesa Rim Road l San Diego, CA 92121
